org.treetank.cache
Interface ICache

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractPersistenceCache, BerkeleyPersistenceCache, LRUCache, NullCache, TransactionLogCache
public interface ICache

Interface for all upcoming cache implementations. Can be a weak one, a LRU-based one or a persistent. However, clear, put and get must to be provided. Instances of this class are used with IReadTransactions as well as with IWriteTransactions.

Author:
Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz

Method Summary
 void clear()
          Clearing the cache.
 NodePageContainer get(long mKey)
          Getting a page related to a given nodepagekey.
 void put(long mKey, NodePageContainer mPage)
          Putting an NodePageContainer into the cache with a corresponding nodepagekey.
 

Method Detail

clear

void clear()
Clearing the cache. That is removing all elements.

get

NodePageContainer get(long mKey)
Getting a page related to a given nodepagekey.

Parameters:
mKey - the key for the requested NodePageContainer
Returns:
NodePageContainer instance related to this key

put

void put(long mKey,
         NodePageContainer mPage)
Putting an NodePageContainer into the cache with a corresponding nodepagekey.

Parameters:
mKey - for putting the page in the cache.
mPage - should be putted in the cache as well.
